pages.text: While exploring basic dungeons, you may stumble across $(item)portal keyhole blocks$(), these contain $(item)advanced portal keys$() and are the only way you can aquire them. To use such a key you will need to upgrade one of your portals, for which you will require two $(item)portal crown$() blocks which can only be found in dungeon chests. You will also need two banners that are either purple or white.
